name: The Carter Center, Inc.
memberOrga: The Carter Center has approximately 1,600 full time employees based in Atlanta and in field offices.
goal: The Carter Center's mission is one of peace with justice, backed by a belief in the inherent value and equality of every individual. In our efforts to advance peace with justice, The Carter Center is guided by a fundamental commitment to human rights and the alleviation of human suffering. We seek to prevent and resolve conflicts, enhance freedom and democracy, and improve health.
interests: International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives: The Carter Center is following the European Civil Protection and Humanitarian Aid Operations in Bangladesh and other initiatives in Liberia.
